insults.insult: This is the END for you, you gutter-crawling cur!
insults.answer: And I’ve got a little TIP for you, get the POINT?

insults.insult: Soon you’ll be wearing my sword like a shish kebab!
insults.answer: First you better stop waiving it like a feather-duster.

insults.insult: My handkerchief will wipe up your blood!
insults.answer: So you got that job as janitor, after all.

insults.insult: People fall at my feet when they see me coming.
insults.answer: Even BEFORE they smell your breath?

insults.insult: I once owned a dog that was smarter than you.
insults.answer: He must have taught you everything you know.

insults.insult: You make me want to puke.
insults.answer: You make me think somebody already did.

insults.insult: Nobody’s ever drawn blood from me and nobody ever will.
You fight like a dairy farmer.
insults.answer: How appropriate. You fight like a cow.

insults.insult: I got this scar on my face during a mighty struggle!
insults.answer: I hope now you’ve learned to stop picking your nose.

insults.insult: Have you stopped wearing diapers yet?
insults.answer: Why, did you want to borrow one?

insults.insult: I’ve heard you were a contemptible sneak.
insults.answer: Too bad no one’s ever heard of YOU at all.

insults.insult: You’re no match for my brains, you poor fool.
insults.answer: I’d be in real trouble if you ever used them.

insults.insult: You have the manners of a beggar.
insults.answer: I wanted to make sure you’d feel comfortable with me.

insults.insult: I’m not going to take your insolence sitting down!
insults.answer: Your hemorrhoids are flaring up again, eh?

insults.insult: There are no words for how disgusting you are.
insults.answer: Yes there are. You just never learned them.

insults.insult: I’ve spoken with apes more polite then you.
insults.answer: I’m glad to hear you attended your family reunion.
